reuters.title: ALLIANT AND MACNEAL-SCHWENDLER SIGN PACT
reuters.body: Alliant Computer Systems Corp <ALNT> said that it has signed an agreement with MacNeal-Schwendler Corp <MNS> where MacNeal will develop a new version of its MSC/NASTRAN software for Alliant's FX/Series Computers. Alliant said MSC/NASTRAN is used for finite element analysis, particularly in the automotive and aerospace industries. Reuter 
